{
                pages:
                [
                  "[{\"text\":\"
  §l§4B§l§n§4⬡⬡§l§4k §l§n§4⬡§l§4f§l§4 Dreg§l§n§4⬡§l§4ra§r

§l    Welcome to a
 decade old world
 made with passion
      and love§r

 ████§4████§r████
 ████§4████§r████
 ████§4████§r████
§4 ████§r████§4████
 ████§r████§4████§r
§4 ████§r████§4████\"}]",
                  "[{\"text\":\"     §6☀§8           
               §r
§n§2▁§n§8▲§n§2▁§n§8◢◣§n§2▁▁§l§8╱╲§n§2▁§n§r▊§n§2▁§n§0▅§n§2▁§n§r 


Page 3-5 Prolugue
Page 6-9 Secrets
Page 10 Realms
Page 14 Thank you\"}]",
                  "[{\"text\":\"§oOur Earth, struck by a catastrophic event known as the Blight happened a few thousand years ago.

§oRuined cities had been long overtaken by the sands of the wastelands and the green of corruption feasted on the remains of the unfortunate. ➡\"}]",
                  "[{\"text\":\"
§oFew places are suitable for those seeking shelter from the corruption but dreams had shown you far away lands beyond canyons of molten rock where this world, now known as Dregora seemed to be healing. ➡\"}]",
                  "[{\"text\":\"
§oHowever, as the dream concluded warmly and softly and the sun rose you did not notice the darkness lurking from behind, slowly creeping closer and closer.§r

###################
#   Information ➡    #
###################\"}]",
                  "[{\"text\":\"Having read the Prologue you should have noticed the sentence of canyons and molten rock.

The keen eye may have deduced the meaning behind this as your travels through dregora should lead to these, and more importantly... ➡\"}]",
                  "[{\"text\":\"the lands beyond riddled with kingdoms, waterfalls, lush oceans, grand mountain ranges and overall beautifull, resource rich places to visit.

These secrets just as mostly everything within the realms of Dregora have been... ➡\"}]",
                  "[{\"text\":\"written in a immersive way without any links leading you away from what makes up these worlds.

So seeking the secrets are to be done within the boundaries of these worlds where you may find libraries of lore filled with magical... ➡
 \"}]",
                  "[{\"text\":\"swords, stones, and their guardians.

So on your travels, if you are willing to read the lore make sure to do so keenly as you may uncover secrets, hidden passages and inform you about the shadows yet to come.\"}]",
                  "[{\"text\":\"Dregora exists out of 4 parts:

§lThe Fromimage Center§r

With the hexagonal structure in it's center you'll find it closely resembles a compass from above.

§lThe Wastelands ... ➡\"}]",
                  "[{\"text\":\"These lands make up the majority of Dregora and are entirely randomly generated. These biomes mostly resemble a wasteland but upon your travels you will find lush, frozen and corrupted biomes as well.

§lThe Farlands... ➡\"}]",
                  "[{\"text\":\"These far away, hidden lands are protected from the wastification by great fiery chasms of molten rock and contain lush biomes full of wonders. These are truly the most beutifull places to visit.

§lThe Depths... ➡\"}]",
                  "[{\"text\":\"These are what make up the subterrainian part of Dregora. Not to be found in all biomes but commonly present in the world as a whole, where some may pose dangers others will house full civilizations.



 \"}]",
                  "[{\"text\":\"And with that, §l§ca world§r not just created by me, NLBlackEagle but you as well as I value §l§cyour opinion§r and without it Dregora wouldn't have been possible. So I would like to §l§cthank you greatly§r and welcome you to open a chat with me on our discord any time!

 \"}]"
                ],
                title:"The Realms of Dregora",
                author:"The Founder",
                display:{Lore:["Dregora, The Blight and you in your adventure through a bountiful world"]}
              }
